EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Optimize and Automate your SAP Testing - APAC - Aug 2014.Email - Miss
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at our webinar, Optimize and Automate Your SAP Testing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Optimize and Automate Your SAP Testing
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
We’re sorry we missed you at our webinar, “Optimize and Automate Your SAP Testing.” We enjoyed talking about time and budget constraint management in SAP implementations, risk identification and management associated with change, and the management of SAP’s dynamic test data environment. Lively questions and dialogue from our audience only improved the experience.
Want to see what you missed? Check out a recording of past webinars at www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts>.
Best wishes, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Thomas Hadorn Managing Director (APAC) Tricentis
Brent Dixon Professional Services Manager (APAC) Tricentis
